Class ConvexHullException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----ConvexHullException
public class ConvexHullException
extends Exception
A class representing exceptions during construction of a convex hull. These can occur for example when all vertices are coplanar.

See Also:
ConvexHull

ConvexHullException()
Construct a convex hull exception.
ConvexHullException(String)
Construct a convex hull exception with a message.

ConvexHullException 
 public ConvexHullException()
Construct a convex hull exception.

ConvexHullException 
 public ConvexHullException(String s)
Construct a convex hull exception with a message.

Parameters:
s - a descriptive error message
